Never heard of this particular issue, but a nice little plugin by name of TAC fuel balancer will solve your problems and more

Which OS are you using?

Might also be a problem with an overly useful mouse driver adding to much input options?

In KSP main folder is settings.cfg,you can open it with any text editor.At the bottom half you will find this section

MODIFIER_KEY
{
	primary = LeftAlt
	secondary = RightAlt
	group = 0
	modeMask = -1
	modeMaskSec = -1
}

.Edit the key you whant to use instead of Alt.
